Title: Prohibits certain agencies from charging for the process of a FOIL request made by state and local agencies or the state legislature
Summary: Prohibits agencies from charging for the process of a FOIL request made by state and local agencies or the state legislature.
LawCode: Amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting certain agencies from charging for the process of a FOIL request made by state and local agencies or the state legislature
